sentences.en: A wave of self-consciousness can wash over her when someone new enters the room.
sentences.cn: 当有陌生人进入房间时，她会感到不自在。

sentences.en: The best psychological place from which to speak is an unselfconscious self-consciousness, providing the illusion of being natural.
sentences.cn: 说话的最佳心理场所是一种不自觉的自我意识，它提供了一种自然的幻觉。

sentences.en: The development of self-consciousness and the notion of individual identity were critical parts of the neurobiological changes that made us human.
sentences.cn: 自我意识的发展和个体认同的概念是使我们成为人类的神经生物学变化的关键部分。
